title: FS:  t206 Krause Tolstoi PSA 4--price cut
author: GregMitch34

posts.post_title: FS:  t206 Krause Tolstoi PSA 4--price cut
posts.post_content:
Terrific  t206 PSA 4  for Harry Krause, portrait variation, with tough Tolstoi back--great image and color.  None higher in either PSA or SGC population reports. Back is fine.    $205 plus $3 shipping.
[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=131425&stc=1&d=1391570231http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=131424&stc=1&d=1391570231[/url]
